xxl.core.relational.query
Class Nodes

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.relational.query.Nodes

public class Nodes
extends Object

This class provides static methods for creating ready to use instances of a node in a directed acyclic graph. Beside this methods, it contains constants for identifying local metadata fragments inside a node's global metadata, methods for accessing them and local metadata factories for updating them.

See Also:
Node

Field Detail

GLOBAL_METADATA_FACTORY

public static final Function<Object,CompositeMetaData<Object,Object>> GLOBAL_METADATA_FACTORY
A local metadata factory that builds up a node's global metadata. The factory must be put to the node's global metadata factory (the switch function that is used for storing the node' local factories) at first, thereafter the local metadata factories used for creating the local metadata fragments building up the global composite metadata can be put to the global metadata factory. The invoke method if this function builds up the global metadata of a specified node, i.e., the local metadata fragments are created by calling the local factories on this node in the same order as they are inserted into the global factory (switch function) and their results are put into the global metadata identified by the identifier of the local factory.

Whensoever at least one local metadata fragment changes, the affected node is urged to propagate this change to its child and parent nodes.

See Also:
Function, Switch, CompositeMetaData

TYPE

public static final String TYPE
This constant is used to identify a node's type inside its global metadata.

See Also:
VARIABLE, Constant Field Values

VARIABLE

public static final int VARIABLE
This constant can be used to denote that a node does not have a fixed number of child or parent nodes.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ALL_SIGNATURES_STRATEGY

public static final String ALL_SIGNATURES_STRATEGY
This constant is used to identify a node's all-signatures strategy inside its global metadata. The all-signatures strategy is represented by a function that is called with the affected node and returns an iteration over the nodes whose signature should be checked in the course of calls to the checkAllSignatures method.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SIGNATURES_OF_CHILDREN

public static final Function<Node,Iterator<Node>> SIGNATURES_OF_CHILDREN
A all-signatures strategy that simple returns the affected node's child nodes.

SIGNATURES_OF_PARENTS

public static final Function<Node,Iterator<Node>> SIGNATURES_OF_PARENTS
A all-signatures strategy that simple returns the affected node's parent nodes.

ANCHOR

public static final String ANCHOR
This constant is used to identify a node's anchor inside its global metadata. Whenever a node's metadata depends on another node's metadata that is not a child of the first node, an anchor is specified inside the node's global metadata that references the required node.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ANCHOR_PLACEMENT_STRATEGY

public static final String ANCHOR_PLACEMENT_STRATEGY
This constant is used to identify a node's anchor placement strategy inside its global metadata. Whenever a node needs another anchor placement strategy than passing it to its child nodes, it can be specified in the node's global metadata.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

RESETTING_METADATA_FACTORY

public static final Function<Object,Object> RESETTING_METADATA_FACTORY
A local metadata factory that can be used to reset different metadata fragments simply by removing the existing metadata fragment stored in the node's global metadata and then causing an exception in such a way as to disable a new metadata fragment to be set.

NODE_WITH_ANCHOR_METADATA_FACTORY

public static final Function<Object,Node> NODE_WITH_ANCHOR_METADATA_FACTORY
A local metadata factory that can be used to update the metadata fragment holding a node in a node's metadata. It places an anchor to the node, opens it and returns it.

Method Detail

newNode

public static final Node newNode(String type,
                                 int numberOfChildren,
                                 int numberOfParents,
                                 Function<? super Node,? extends Iterator<Node>> allSignaturesStrategy,
                                 Function<Object,?> globalMetadataFactory)
Creates a new node providing the given local metadata fragments and registers factory methods for this metadata fragments.

Parameters:
type - a string identifying the type of the node to be returned.
numberOfChildren - the number of children required by the returned node. It can be set to VARIABLE for indicating that the node does not need a fixed number of child nodes.
numberOfParents - the number of parents required by the returned node. It can be set to VARIABLE for indicating that the node does not need a fixed number of parent nodes.
allSignaturesStrategy - the function that is called with the created node and returns an iteration over the nodes whose signature should be checked in the course of calls to the node's checkAllSignatures method.
globalMetadataFactory - a factory for the node's global metadata, i.e., a factory that is used to update the global metadata of the node to be returned.
Returns:
a new node providing the given local metadata fragments.

public static final Node newNode(String type,
                                 int numberOfChildren,
                                 int numberOfParents,
                                 Function<? super Node,? extends Iterator<Node>> allSignaturesStrategy)

Parameters:
type - a string identifying the type of the node to be returned.
numberOfChildren - the number of children required by the returned node. It can be set to VARIABLE for indicating that the node does not need a fixed number of child nodes.
numberOfParents - the number of parents required by the returned node. It can be set to VARIABLE for indicating that the node does not need a fixed number of parent nodes.
allSignaturesStrategy - the function that is called with the created node and returns an iteration over the nodes whose signature should be checked in the course of calls to the node's checkAllSignatures method.

newNode

public static final Node newNode(String type,
                                 int numberOfChildren,
                                 int numberOfParents)
Creates a new node providing the given local metadata fragments and registers factory methods for its metadata fragments. The node's checkAllSignatures method checks the node's signature and its child nodes' signatures.

Parameters:
type - a string identifying the type of the node to be returned.
numberOfChildren - the number of children required by the returned node. It can be set to VARIABLE for indicating that the node does not need a fixed number of child nodes.
numberOfParents - the number of parents required by the returned node. It can be set to VARIABLE for indicating that the node does not need a fixed number of parent nodes.
Returns:
a new node providing the given local metadata fragments.

newNode

public static final Node newNode(String type,
                                 int numberOfChildren,
                                 Function<? super Node,? extends Iterator<Node>> allSignaturesStrategy)
Creates a new node providing the given local metadata fragments and registers factory methods for its metadata fragments. The returned node does not need a fixed number of parent nodes.

Parameters:
type - a string identifying the type of the node to be returned.
numberOfChildren - the number of children required by the returned node. It can be set to VARIABLE for indicating that the node does not need a fixed number of child nodes.
allSignaturesStrategy - the function that is called with the created node and returns an iteration over the nodes whose signature should be checked in the course of calls to the node's checkAllSignatures method.
Returns:
a new node providing the given local metadata fragments.

newNode

public static final Node newNode(String type,
                                 int numberOfChildren)
Creates a new node providing the given local metadata fragments and registers factory methods for its metadata fragments. The returned node does not need a fixed number of parent nodes and its checkAllSignatures method checks the node's signature and its child nodes' signatures.

Parameters:
type - a string identifying the type of the node to be returned.
numberOfChildren - the number of children required by the returned node. It can be set to VARIABLE for indicating that the node does not need a fixed number of child nodes.
Returns:
a new node providing the given local metadata fragments.

                                 Function<? super Node,? extends Iterator<Node>> allSignaturesStrategy)
Creates a new node providing the given local metadata fragments and registers factory methods for its metadata fragments. The returned node does not need a fixed number of child nodes and parent nodes.

Parameters:
type - a string identifying the type of the node to be returned.
allSignaturesStrategy - the function that is called with the created node and returns an iteration over the nodes whose signature should be checked in the course of calls to the node's checkAllSignatures method.
Returns:
a new node providing the given local metadata fragments.

newNode

public static final Node newNode(String type)
Creates a new node providing the given local metadata fragment and registers factory methods for its metadata fragments. The returned node does not need a fixed number of child nodes and parent nodes and it's checkAllSignatures method checks the node's signature and its child nodes' signatures.

Parameters:
type - a string identifying the type of the node to be returned.
Returns:
a new node providing the given local metadata fragment.

placeAnchor

public static final void placeAnchor(Node node,
                                     Node anchor)
Places the specified anchor to the given node and its child nodes. Whenever a node's global metadata provides an anchor placement strategy it is invoked with the node and the specified anchor to be placed.

Parameters:
node - the node for which the specified anchor should be placed.
anchor - the anchor to be placed.

getNode

public static final Node getNode(Node node,
                                 Object identifier)
Returns the node from of the given node's metadata associated with the specified identifier.

Parameters:
node - the node whose metadata should be revised for a node associated with the specified identifier.
identifier - the identifier the node to be returned is associated with.
Returns:
the node from of the given node's metadata associated with the specified identifier.

getNodes

public static final Cursor<Node> getNodes(Node node,
                                          String identifierPrefix)
Returns an iteration over the nodes from of the given node's metadata associated with the specified identifier prefix followed by a consecutive number.

Parameters:
node - the node whose metadata should be revised for nodes associated with the specified identifier prefix followed by consecutive numbers.
identifierPrefix - the prefix of the identifier the nodes to be returned are associated with.
Returns:
an iteration over the nodes from of the given node's metadata associated with the specified identifier prefix followed by a consecutive number.

countNodes

public static final int countNodes(Node node,
                                   String identifierPrefix)
Counts the nodes that are registered to the given node's global metadata using the given identifier prefix followed by a number and returns the number.

Parameters:
node - the node whose metadata should be revised for nodes associated with the specified identifier prefix followed by consecutive numbers.
identifierPrefix - the prefix of the identifier the nodes to be returned are associated with.
Returns:
the number of nodes that are registered to the given node's global metadata using the given identifier prefix followed by a number and returns the number.

putNodes

public static final void putNodes(Node node,
                                  String identifierPrefix,
                                  Iterator<? extends Node> nodes,
                                  Predicate<? super Node> precondition,
                                  Function<Object,? extends Node> localMetaDataFactory,
                                  boolean addToSignature)
                           throws IllegalArgumentException
Puts the nodes contained by the given iteration to the global metadata of the given node using the specified identifier prefix followed by a consectuive number associated with their positions (indices) inside the iteration for generating unique identifier.

Parameters:
node - the node whose global metadata should be extended by the specified nodes.
identifierPrefix - a string that is used in combination with a consectuive number associated with their positions (indices) inside the given iteration for generating unique identifiers.
nodes - an iteration holding the nodes that should be put to the global metadata of the given node.
precondition - a predicate that is invoked before a node of the given iteration is put to the global metadata of the given node. If the precondition does not hold, the execution of this method is interrupted by an exception.
localMetaDataFactory - a local metadata factory that should be used to create/update the metadata represented by the put nodes.
addToSignature - decides whether the put nodes should be considered when checking the given nodes signature.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the specified precondition does not hold for a node of the given iteration.

putNodes

public static final void putNodes(Node node,
                                  String identifierPrefix,
                                  Iterator<? extends Node> nodes,
                                  Predicate<? super Node> precondition,
                                  boolean addToSignature)
Puts the nodes contained by the given iteration to the global metadata of the given node using the specified identifier prefix followed by a consectuive number associated with their positions (indices) inside the iteration for generating unique identifier.

Parameters:
node - the node whose global metadata should be extended by the specified nodes.
identifierPrefix - a string that is used in combination with a consectuive number associated with their positions (indices) inside the given iteration for generating unique identifiers.
nodes - an iteration holding the nodes that should be put to the global metadata of the given node.
precondition - a predicate that is invoked before a node of the given iteration is put to the global metadata of the given node. If the precondition does not hold, the execution of this method is interrupted by an exception.
addToSignature - decides whether the put nodes should be considered when checking the given nodes signature.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the specified precondition does not hold for a node of the given iteration.
